Automate application testing with ease using our browser extension for RapidQ app! Our extension captures user interactions as you navigate through the app, allowing you to create detailed test steps effortlessly. Simply perform your actions, and our extension will generate test steps based on your interactions. Streamline your testing process and improve efficiency with our intuitive tool.

Key Features:

- Capture user interactions in RapidQ app.
- Generate test steps based on captured interactions.
- Simplify test case creation and execution.
- Improve testing efficiency and accuracy.

Try our extension today and supercharge your testing workflow!
